mapper.select: SELECT A.COUNTRY AS COUNTRYID , CASE WHEN B.KOREAN_NM IS NULL THEN B.ENGLISH_NM ELSE B.KOREAN_NM END AS COUNTRYNAME , MAX(A.CONFIRMED) AS CONFIRMED , MAX(A.DEATHS) AS DEATHS , MAX(A.RECOVERED) AS RECOVERED , MAX(DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%Y년%m월%d일')) AS UPDATEDDATE FROM WORLD_DAILY A JOIN COUNTRY_INFO B ON A.COUNTRY = B.ID GROUP BY COUNTRYID , COUNTRYNAME ORDER BY MAX(A.CONFIRMED) DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATEDDATE , CASE WHEN B.KOREAN_NM IS NULL THEN B.ENGLISH_NM ELSE B.KOREAN_NM END AS COUNTRYNAME , A.CONFIRMED , A.DEATHS , A.RECOVERED FROM WORLD_DAILY A JOIN COUNTRY_INFO B ON A.COUNTRY = B.ID WHERE A.COUNTRY = #{COUNTRY} ORDER BY A.UPDATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 30
SELECT ENGLISH_NM FROM COUNTRY_INFO ORDER BY ID
